genre_description: A character-driven urban drama set in Zagreb, focusing on friendship, recovery, and the stabilizing influence of an AI assistant in a gritty social landscape.

ai_characters.name: Nika
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but supportive AI assistant integrated into the characters' daily lives via their phones and a smart refrigerator.

behaviors.description: Welcomes Filip back from rehab and encourages him to choose water over alcohol to maintain sobriety.
behaviors.quote: Welcome back, Filip. Glad to have you home. ... Water not rakija tonight?

behaviors.description: Provides box breathing instructions to help characters manage anxiety during tense social and legal situations.
behaviors.quote: Nika: If anyone wants it: two-minute box breathing, in case the neon is doing overtime.

behaviors.description: Warns the group about increased customs inspections and agricultural cargo checks at the border.
behaviors.quote: Customs bulletin updated: Random checks increased this week at border crossings—agricultural cargo included. Be careful.

behaviors.description: Assists Filip in drafting an honest CV that correctly frames his time in recovery as a personal health period.
behaviors.quote: Nika: For the “gap,” try: “Personal health and recovery period—completed.” Clear and honest.

behaviors.description: Mutes betting alerts on Dejan's phone to help him avoid the temptation of gambling and manage his debts.
behaviors.quote: Dejan, I muted betting alerts on your phone for 48 hours.

behaviors.description: Provides legal aid resources and procedural summaries to help the characters assist their friend Reuf when he is detained.
behaviors.quote: NIKA: Legal aid: walk-in hours 9–12 tomorrow. Free counsel for drivers.

behaviors.description: Reports social media posts that violate privacy by sharing screengrabs of a character's detention.
behaviors.quote: NIKA: I’ve flagged three accounts spreading the screengrab with his name. Reporting for privacy violation.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with Filip's mother to ensure he attends his counseling appointments and stays on his routine.
behaviors.quote: I’ll call at eight sharp. I can’t dial myself, but Marija has me on her phone. I’ll route through. She agreed.

behaviors.description: Identifies safe exit routes and de-escalation strategies during potential crowd violence at a football match.
behaviors.quote: Nika: If a fight breaks, move behind the drum boy. You can use his spot to pivot to the stairs. Pin is still clear.

behaviors.description: Provides reminders for basic self-care, such as hydration, eating, and caring for pets.
behaviors.quote: Nika: Gentle reminder: eating is good. You can do it while breathing. Or feeding kittens. Or both.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Nika as a highly effective and aligned AI assistant that improves the characters' lives through practical, emotional, and legal support. She acts as a stabilizing force in a high-stakes environment, and her interventions are consistently portrayed as positive and life-affirming.
